searchCOMBAT TB Explorer

The COMBAT TB Explorer is a comprehensive resource for M. tuberculosis genome, proteome and biochemical pathway knowledge.

buildCOMBATB TB Workbench

The COMBAT TB Workbench is a forthcoming bioinformatics analysis workbench with tools for variant discovery and annotation, phylogeny construction and clade-based variant prioritisation.
